@pixi/constants > PIXI > SAMPLER_TYPES

PIXI.SAMPLER_TYPES 

SAMPLER_TYPES

Various sampler types. Correspond to sampler, isampler, usampler GLSL types respectively. WebGL1 works only with FLOAT.
